name: Trades To Webhook
short_description: Share your trades with your favorite webhooks, like Telegram. You can choose to share openings; closings; changes; you can choose which pair or which label.

params.title: Trades To Webhook x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Only This ?
params.content: You can choose to monitor only the pair in which the cBot was started

params.title: empty = all | label1,label2,label3
params.content: If the value is empty all labels will be monitored, otherwise only the inserted labels separated with a comma will be monitored

params.title: EndPoint
params.content: The url of the API service

params.title: POST
params.content: The POST parameters to be sent, in the placeholder {0} will be inserted the formatted message text

params.title: Opened (empty = disabled)
params.content: The message to be sent if open, if empty nothing is sent. I recommend that you try a standard message to check the placeholders.

params.title: Modified (empty = disabled)
params.content: The message to be sent if modified, if empty nothing is sent. I recommend that you try a standard message to check the placeholders.

params.title: Closed (empty = disabled)
params.content: The message to be sent if closed, if empty nothing is sent. I recommend that you try a standard message to check the placeholders.
